title: Pathology Clinic
description2: Pathology is the study of disease. It is the bridge between science and medicine. It underpins every aspect of patient care, from diagnostic testing and treatment advice to using cutting-edge genetic technologies and preventing disease.
description1: For people requiring additional follow up, the Cardiac Clinic provides rapid access to professionals specialized in diagnosing and treating heart disease.

title: Cardiology Clinic
description2: Cardiology is the study of disease. It is the bridge between science and medicine. It underpins every aspect of patient care, from diagnostic testing and treatment advice to using cutting-edge genetic technologies and preventing disease.
description1: All cardiologists study the disorders of the heart, but the study of adult and child heart disorders are trained to take care of small children and adult heart disease.

title: Neurological Clinic
description1: Some neurologists receive subspecialty training focusing on a particular area of the fields, these training programs are called fellowships, and are one to two years.

title: Pediatric Clinic
description2: Pathology is the study of disease. It is the bridge between science and medicine. It underpins every aspect of patient care, from diagnostic testing and treatment advice to using cutting-edge genetic technologies and preventing disease.
description1: Pediatric providers see patient form birth to early adulthood to make sure the patient stay healthy. Our care includes preventive health checkups

title: Laboratory Analysis
description2: Pathology is the study of disease. It is the bridge between science and medicine. It underpins every aspect of patient care, from diagnostic testing and treatment advice to using cutting-edge genetic technologies and preventing disease.
description1: Analyzing the radon or radon progeny concentrations with passive devices, or the act of calibrating radon or radon progeny measurement devices.
